cause.description:
Conservation Today, Wetlands for Tomorrow. Ducks Unlimited is for the protection and restoration of wetlands across the country. These wetlands provide valuable habitat for wildlife as well as excellent places for recreation.
1. More than 80,000 acres of wetlands are lost annually, that is 80,000 acres too many.
2. 70% of wetlands in the Prairie Pothole region have been drained or degraded. This region provides important nesting grounds for Pintails, Mallards, Teal, and Gadwall. Nesting areas that will soon be gone.
cause.mission: Protect, enhance, restore, and manage important wetlands for the conservation of waterfowl.
cause.name: Ducks Unlimited
